overview: Through a long continuous take filmed on a cold November morning in Cumbria, UK. The video presents the spectator with a ‘real time’ phenomenological experience of change, transience and transformation. As the mist begins to clear more of the landscape is gradually perceived. The mist also works as a screen to both reveal and obscure the intensity of the suns light. Eventually the mist returns and once again the video space is changed.
title: November Morning
